description: Traditional Italian dish with sweet raisins and crunchy pine nuts added.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Vegan,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Eggplant Caponata with Raisins & Pine Nuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and chopped
0.5 leek, bottom white/light green part, sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Drizzle the eggplant with 1 tbs of oil and roast in the oven on a roasting tray for 30 minutes tossing halfway through.
Heat up a large saucepan to a medium heat with 1 tbs of oil and fry the onions, courgette and peppers for 6 minutes.
Once the eggplant has roasted, remove from the oven and place on the pan with the other vegetables and fry for 2 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients apart from the parsley, mix well and allow the entire dish to simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from the heat, garnish with parsley and serve with a choice of side.
